short_summary: This is an amendment to a standing offer for the supply of Septic/Hydro Vac services. The supply of Septic/Hydro Vac services is required by the Department of National Defence in Wainwright, Alberta.
description: A Regional Individual Standing Offer for the supply of Septic/Hydro Vac services is required by the Department of National Defence, Wainwright, AB, as detailed herein and in accordance with the line items identified at Annex Basis of Payment.
tags: Commercial-Off-The-Shelf (COTS), DND normal operations business value
full_summary:
=================

### Septic Hydro-Vac Services Tender (W6900-233339)

### English
#### Request for Standing Offer

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a vendor to provide septic hydro-vac services through a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) to the Department of National Defence, Wainwright, Alberta.

The services required include provisions for septic and hydro vac services as detailed in the annex.

The proposed standing offer must comply with all mandatory technical criteria and requirements outlined in the RFP.

### French
#### Demande d’offre à commandes

Le Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC) est à la recherche d’un fournisseur pour fournir des services de fosse septique/Hydro Vac par voie d’Offre à Commandes individuelle Régionale (OCIR) au ministère de la Défense nationale, Wainwright, Alberta.

Les services requis incluent la fourniture de services pour fosse septique et frais de récupération par l’hydrovac comme détaillé dans l’annexe.

L’Offre à Commandes proposée doit se conformer à tous les critères obligatoires et exigences du perspectives d’adhésion de l’appel à propositions.

### Important Tender Information

* Solicitation Number: WS4248344575
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services
* End User: Department of National Defence, Wainwright, Alberta
* Locations: Wainwright
* Notice URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18031785?extsite=MTgwMzE3ODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Amendments

* The tender closing date has been extended to January 4, 2024 at 14:00 EST. Submissions received after this time will be considered non-responsive.

### Request for Standing Offer Timeline

* Submission Deadline: January 4, 2024 at 14:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 31, 2024
* Proposed Contract End Date: March 31, 2027

Please contact [Willy Zumbado Diaz, SPAC/PSPC](mailto:willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for any inquiries. 

Last updated on January 11,
